Description: Rim sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre and alternating red and white dots; top of lip glazed; exterior: row of dots between lines; surface worn below.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see British Museum 1888,0601.508 and Cambridge Fitzwilliam GR.79.1894.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0720) (phase 2)
